entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 20 January 2023
